install.name: Content - ITPShare
install.author: Todor Iliev
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2010 Todor Iliev ( ITPrism.com ). All rights reserved.
install.description:
ITPShare is a plugin that adds republish buttons of Twitter, Facebook, Digg, LinkedIn, Stumbleupon,...on your site. It will help you to find more readers for your posts.

Invest in the extension improvement. You can sponsor the extension via SMS or PayPal.

Please, vote for the extension on Joomla! Extensions Directory

param.name: position
param.label: Position
param.description: A position where you want to put buttons.

param.name: showInArticles
param.label: Show In Articles
param.description: Display buttons in the view 'article'.

param.name: showInCategories
param.label: Show In Categories
param.description: Display buttons in the view 'category'.

param.name: showInSections
param.label: Show In Sections
param.description: Display buttons in the view 'section'.

param.name: showInFrontPage
param.label: Show In FrontPage
param.description: Display buttons in the view 'frontpage'.

param.name: excludeSections
param.label: Exclude sections
param.description: List with excluded sections divided by comma. You must enter the IDs of sections.

param.name: excludeCats
param.label: Exclude categories
param.description: List with excluded categories divided by comma. You must enter the IDs of categories.

param.name: excludeArticles
param.label: Exclude articles
param.description: List of excluded articles divided by comma. You must enter the IDs of articles.

param.name: includeArticles
param.label: Display in that articles
param.description: Displays the buttons in these articles notwithstanding the exclusion settings. You must enter the IDs of articles.

param.name: twitterButton
param.label: Twitter Button
param.description: Show or hide Twitter buttons.

param.name: twitterName
param.label: Twitter Name
param.description: Enter the name of your Twitter account.

param.name: twitterRecommend
param.label: Twitter Recommend
param.description: Enter the username of the related account.

param.name: twitterHashtag
param.label: Twitter Hashtags
param.description: Comma separated hashtags appended to tweet text.

param.name: twitterCounter
param.label: Twitter Counter
param.description: Show or hide Twitter counter.

param.name: twitterLanguage
param.label: Twitter Language
param.description: Choose the language of the Twitter button.

param.name: tumblrButton
param.label: Tumblr Button
param.description: Show or hide the Tumblr button.

param.name: tumblrType
param.label: Tumblr Type
param.description: The type of your Tumblr button.

param.name: facebookLikeButton

param.description: Show or hide Facebook Like button.

param.name: facebookLikeRenderer
param.label: Facebook Like Renderer
param.description: Choose the renderer of your Facebook Like button.

param.name: facebookLikeAction
param.label: Facebook Button Text
param.description: The verb to display on the button. Options: 'like', 'recommend'

param.name: facebookLikeType
param.label: Facebook Like Type
param.description: The type of your Facebook Like button.

param.name: facebookLikeFaces
param.label: Facebook Show Faces
param.description: Show or hide faces of people.

param.name: facebookLikeColor
param.label: Facebook Like Colour

param.description: The font to display in the button. Options: 'arial', 'lucida grande', 'segoe ui', 'tahoma', 'trebuchet ms', 'verdana'

param.name: facebookLikeWidth

param.name: fbDynamicLocale

param.name: fbLocale
param.label: Language
param.description: A list with locations and language for the button. Default location - English [en_US].

param.name: facebookLikeAppId
param.label: Facebook App ID
param.description: Enter the ID of the your domain name. For more information read the documentation.

param.name: facebookLikeSend
param.label: Facebook Send Buttons
param.description: Specifies whether to include a 'Send button' with the Like button. This only works with the XFBML version.

param.name: facebookRootDiv
param.label: Facebook Root Div
param.description: Put a FB root div element into the page code.

param.name: facebookLoadJsLib
param.label: Load Facebook JS library
param.description: Pass loading the Facebook JavaScript library 'All.js'. It works only with XFBML. Thus avoiding repeated loading library, if you are using other Facebook widgets. Accelerating the speed of the site and avoid conflicts between the Facebook widgets.

param.name: loadTumblrJsLib
param.label: Load Tumblr JS library
param.description: Pass loading the Tumblr JavaScript library 'share.js'. Thus avoiding repeated loading library, if you are using other Tumblr widgets. Accelerating the speed of the site and avoid conflicts between the Tumblr widgets.

param.name: loadDiggJsLib
param.label: Load Digg JS library
param.description: Pass loading the Digg JavaScript library 'buttons.js'. Thus avoiding repeated loading library, if you are using other Digg widgets. Accelerating the speed of the site and avoid conflicts between the Digg widgets.

param.name: loadGooglePlusJsLib
param.label: Load Google JS library
param.description: Pass loading the Google Plus JavaScript library 'buttons.js'. Thus avoiding repeated loading library, if you are using other Google Plus widgets. Accelerating the speed of the site and avoid conflicts between the Google Plus widgets.

param.name: loadCss
param.label: Load style.css
param.description: The style.css is a file that conations button position and some styles of the ReTweetMe button. You can disable the file loading if you have your own styles.
